import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { listServiceproviders, saveService } from '../actions/serviceprovideraction'; import { Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; function ServiceAdd (props) { const [image,setImage]= useState(''); const [category,setCategory]= useState(''); const [countInStock,setCount]= useState(''); const [description,setDescription]= useState(''); const [name,setName]= useState(''); const [price,setPrice]= useState(''); const serviceProviderList = useSelector(state=> state.serviceProviderList); const {loading,service,error} = serviceProviderList; const serviceSave = useSelector(state=> state.serviceSave); const {loading: loadingSave,error: errorSave} = serviceSave; const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listServiceproviders()); return() =>{ // }; },[] ) const submitHandler= (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(saveService({name,price,description,category,image,countInStock})); } return(
{service.map(product=>( ))}
